posts.post_content:
Offered are five very nice crease-free T206s that have received a MK qualifier from PSA.  There are no marks on these cards; however, there are some hard-to-see impression lines on the backs from pencil marks that have been carefully removed using a high polymer eraser.  All of these cards are higher-end for the grade in my view.

Prices include shipping.  First committed email gets the card.

Thanks.  Scot

Easterly PSA 5 MK -- $59
LaPorte PSA 5 MK -- $59
Stone PSA 5 MK -- SOLD
Hoffman (St. Louis) PSA 4 MK -- $33
Mullen PSA 4 MK -- SOLD
